My dinner with Jimbo
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2002 Topics ( Year Of The Password): My dinner with Jimbo
By torey luvullo on Saturday, October 19, 2002 - 12:07 pm:

Many of you know already that i met up with, and had dinner with, Farmer Jimbo in Cincinnati on thursday. To the relative newcomers on the board, FJ was a mighty trainer in MR2 back in the days of azn-beast, dark phoenix and the like. He helped repost a lot of the archived material on b campbell's old board when we moved it here. He has been mostly inactive lately.

Jimbo says "hey" to everyone. He is playing counterstrike, to the point where he upgraded his internet connection to accomodate its needs. He is active on gamefaqs, but not in the mr sections. His job, of managing a nonprofit corporation active in helping support high school theatrical programs and productions, keeps him very busy as well.

it's always good to catch up with old friends, and it was a very enjoyable time stuffing my face with ribs and guiness and chatting with jimbo.

By Farmer Jimbo on Monday, October 21, 2002 - 01:57 pm:

Hey all, I still lurk by here once in a while. I just don't play anymore so I feel silly posting.

I had fun. So who won, the crook, or you? (nice dinner with Andre ref BTW)

By torey luvullo on Monday, October 21, 2002 - 03:33 pm:

the argument went well. they never announce a decision, except in extremely clear cases [which mine wasn't], but i feel cautiously confident.

By CHONAS009 on Monday, October 21, 2002 - 08:41 pm:

counter strike is fun and i can be found on [CSF]Gaming Community when it isnt getting moved
